CFBD Metrics Endpoint

cfbd_metrics.Rd

CFBD Metrics Endpoint

Get team game averages for Predicted Points Added (PPA)

Get team game averages for Predicted Points Added (PPA)

Get player game averages for Predicted Points Added (PPA)

Get player season averages for Predicted Points Added (PPA)

Calculate Predicted Points using Down and Distance

Get team averages for Predicted Points Added (PPA)

Get Pre-game Win Probability Data from API

Get win probability chart data from API

cfbd_metrics_ppa_games(
  year,
  week = NULL,
  team = NULL,
  conference = NULL,
  excl_garbage_time = FALSE
)

cfbd_metrics_ppa_games(
  year,
  week = NULL,
  team = NULL,
  conference = NULL,
  excl_garbage_time = FALSE
)

cfbd_metrics_ppa_players_games(
  year = NULL,
  week = NULL,
  team = NULL,
  position = NULL,
  athlete_id = NULL,
  threshold = NULL,
  excl_garbage_time = FALSE
)

cfbd_metrics_ppa_players_season(
  year = NULL,
  team = NULL,
  conference = NULL,
  position = NULL,
  athlete_id = NULL,
  threshold = NULL,
  excl_garbage_time = FALSE
)

cfbd_metrics_ppa_predicted(down, distance)

cfbd_metrics_ppa_teams(
  year = 2019,
  team = NULL,
  conference = NULL,
  excl_garbage_time = FALSE
)

cfbd_metrics_wp_pregame(
  year = NULL,
  week = NULL,
  team = NULL,
  season_type = "regular"
)

cfbd_metrics_wp(game_id)

Arguments

year

(Integer optional): Year, 4 digit format (YYYY)
week

(Integer optional): Week - values from 1-15, 1-14 for seasons pre-playoff, i.e. 2013 or earlier
team

(String optional): D-I Team
conference

(String optional): Conference name - select a valid FBS conference
Conference names P5: ACC, Big 12, Big Ten, SEC, Pac-12
Conference names G5 and FBS Independents: Conference USA, Mid-American, Mountain West, FBS Independents, American Athletic
excl_garbage_time

(Logical default FALSE): Select whether to exclude Garbage Time (TRUE or FALSE)
position

(string optional): Position abbreviation of the player you are searching for.
Position Group - options include:
* Offense: QB, RB, FB, TE, OL, G, OT, C, WR
* Defense: DB, CB, S, LB, DE, DT, NT, DL
* Special Teams: K, P, LS, PK
athlete_id

(Integer optional): Athlete ID filter for querying a single athlete
Can be found using the cfbfastR::cfbd_player_info() function.
threshold

(Integer optional): Minimum threshold of plays.
down

(Integer required): Down filter
distance

(Integer required): Distance filter
season_type

(String default regular): Select Season Type: regular or postseason
game_id

(Integer required): Game ID filter for querying a single game
Can be found using the cfbfastR::cfbd_game_info() function

Source

https://api.collegefootballdata.com/ppa/players/games

https://api.collegefootballdata.com/ppa/players/season

https://api.collegefootballdata.com/ppa/predicted

https://api.collegefootballdata.com/ppa/teams

https://api.collegefootballdata.com/metrics/wp

Examples

if (FALSE) {
  cfbd_metrics_ppa_games(year = 2019, team = 'TCU')
}
if (FALSE) {
  cfbd_metrics_ppa_games(year = 2019, team = 'TCU')
}
if (FALSE) {
  cfbd_metrics_ppa_players_games(year = 2019,week=3, team = 'TCU')
}
if (FALSE) {
  cfbd_metrics_ppa_players_season(year = 2019, team = 'TCU')
}
if (FALSE) {
  cfbd_metrics_ppa_predicted(down = 1, distance = 10)

  cfbd_metrics_ppa_predicted(down = 3, distance = 10)
}
if (FALSE) {
  cfbd_metrics_ppa_teams(year = 2019, team = 'TCU')
}
if (FALSE) {
  cfbd_metrics_wp_pregame(year = 2019, week=9, team='Texas A&M')
}
if (FALSE) {
  cfbd_metrics_wp(game_id = 401012356)
}
